query.mssql:
if exists (select * from dbo.Sungero_Docflow_Params params where params.[Key] = 'ArioUrl') begin delete from dbo.Sungero_Docflow_Params where dbo.Sungero_Docflow_Params.[Key] = 'ArioUrl' end
if exists (select * from dbo.Sungero_Docflow_Params params where params.[Key] = 'MinFactProbability') begin delete from dbo.Sungero_Docflow_Params where dbo.Sungero_Docflow_Params.[Key] = 'MinFactProbability' end
if exists (select * from dbo.Sungero_Docflow_Params params where params.[Key] = 'TrustedFactProbability') begin delete from dbo.Sungero_Docflow_Params where dbo.Sungero_Docflow_Params.[Key] = 'TrustedFactProbability' end
